game.title: The Dragon's Lair
game.objective: Defeat the dragon Smaug and retrieve the Arkenstone.
game.description: The dragon Smaug has taken over the Lonely Mountain and is terrorizing the people of Erebor. You must go to the mountain and defeat Smaug to retrieve the Arkenstone, a powerful artifact that can restore the kingdom of Erebor.
game.reward: The Arkenstone and a share of the dragon's treasure.

task.description: The Lonely Mountain is located in the north of Middle-earth. You can travel there by foot or by horse.

task.objective: Finding the secret entrance to the dragon's lair - seek a key.
task.description: The key is required to access the door. Look for it nearby or ask for assistance.
task.location: North side of the Lonely Mountain, near the entrance

task.description: Smaug is a formidable foe. Use策略 and your weapons to defeat him.

task.objective: Retrieve the Arkenstone and return it to Thorin Oakenshield.
task.description: The Arkenstone can be found in Smaug's treasure hoard. Return it to its rightful place.
task.location: Heart of the dragon's lair, inside the lair
